question: is prosopagnosia inherited or  acquired?
ideal_answer: Prosopagnosia can be inherited in an autosomal dominant mode of inheritance (congenital prosopagnosia) or acquired following a large unilateral right-hemispheric lesion in frontal (acquired prosopagnosia).
